description: Maximum Hanger/Support Spacing for Galvanized Steel Rectangular Ducts by Size and Gauge, per SMACNA 4th Edition
notes: Spacing is the maximum allowed between hangers/supports for horizontal runs.
Heavier duct gauges may allow longer spacing per SMACNA.
Always use at least one support at each joint and as close as practical to connections, per code.
Verify local code or special project requirements for exceptions.
